Hero.title: One Hero. Three Languages.
Hero.subtitle: Discover bilingual bedtime stories for children 3+. Read the same tale in Finnish, English, or Swedish — with one hero and one adventure.

Steps.title: How it works
Steps.subtitle: Simple steps to create magical bilingual stories for your child.

choose.title: 1. Choose
choose.description: Pick your language (FI / EN / SV), your child’s age and story type — bedtime or daytime.

read.title: 2. Read
read.description: Get your story instantly. Translate it with one click — same hero, same plot.

save.title: 3. Save & Share
save.description: Add stories to your library, download as PDF or share with family and friends.
